rows.label: qev061001_MSG0049
rows.name:
Well? Did you find Kiliran? *fsssh*
Have you unlocked the disk?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev061001_MSG0050
rows.name:
Ah, I see that its contents are visible now.
Thank you so much! *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev061001_MSG0051
rows.name:
[ST:playername ], I can promise that your
name will go down in Zaruboggan history alongside
the results of this crucial research. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev061001_MSG0052
rows.name: I will start it up immediately.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev061001_MSG0053
rows.name:
Oh... Oh! Oh my... This is Golbogga... *fsssh*
I never dreamed to find such a wealth of information
intact.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev061001_MSG0054
rows.name:
Wh-what?* fsssh* THIS is the true face of Golbogga?!
But then...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev061001_MSG0055
rows.name: *fsssssssssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev061001_JNK0070
rows.name: Query[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev061001_SEL0071
rows.name: Ask Feloran what he has learned about Golbogga.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev061001_JNK0080
rows.name: Wait[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev061001_SEL0081
rows.name: Keep quiet and let Feloran think.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev061001_MSG0056
rows.name:
Y-yes. Apologies. *fsssh* It's just...
I'm just a bit shocked, honestly.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev061001_MSG0057
rows.name: But you deserve an explanation. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev061001_MSG0058
rows.name: *fssssssssssssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev061001_MSG0059
rows.name:
Ah. Apologies. I just... Well, seeing the true face of
Golbogga just came as something of a shock. *fsssh*
It took a moment to process.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev061001_MSG0060
rows.name:
But you deserve an explanation. *fsssh*
Just give me a moment to compose myself...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev061001_MSG0061
rows.name:
*ahem* Yes. *fsssh* So this disk does, in fact, contain
a record of Golbogga's appearance.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev061001_MSG0062
rows.name:
It seems that many Golboggas existed in a previous
civilization. And many types of them, what's more.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev061001_MSG0063
rows.name:
*fsssh* But their appearance... Those who birthed my
kind and washed Bedun in voltant were...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev061001_MSG0064
rows.name:
They were nothing at all like us. *fsssh*
In fact, they looked like...humans.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev061001_MSG0065
rows.name:
At present, I can't even begin to understand what the
implications of that might be. I'll need to spend more
time with the data on this disk first. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev061001_MSG0066
rows.name: Regardless, thank you for all your assistance. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev061001_MSG0067
rows.name:
Here is your compensation. *fsssh*
Take it with my compliments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev061001_MSG0068
rows.name: *fsssh* And if I may, one final question before you go.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev061001_MSG0069
rows.name:
Was your Earth blanketed in the same beauteous
impurity as Bedun? *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev061001_JNK0090
rows.name: Confirm[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev061001_SEL0091
rows.name: Explain that Earth was plagued by pollution.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev061001_JNK0100
rows.name: Deny[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev061001_SEL0101
rows.name: Say that Earth was beautiful and pure.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev061001_MSG0070
rows.name: *fsssh* To think that such a paradise once existed![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev061001_MSG0071
rows.name:
...Hmm? You seem sad. You should be more proud of
your homeworld. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev061001_MSG0072
rows.name:
*fsssh* I see. So you had just begun in your mission to
shroud it in voltant.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev061001_MSG0073
rows.name:
Knowing you humans' determination, I am certain it
would not have taken long! *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev061001_MSG0074
rows.name:
Hmm... Hearing that suggests that similarities exist
between your kind and our gods all the more. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev061001_MSG0075
rows.name:
A thirst to dig up everything beneath the soil,
and then lay waste to all above it! *fsssh*
And finally, in the end, to create...us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev061001_MSG0076
rows.name:
Perhaps we ought look to humans to refine their ways
until they can become as a second race of Golboggas
to my kind. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev061001_MSG0001
rows.name:
*fsssh* We successfully immigrated to New LA thanks
to your help, [ST:playername ].[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev061001_MSG0002
rows.name: And I know you have aided many of my kind since.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev061001_JNK0010
rows.name: Confirm

rows.label: qev061001_SEL0011
rows.name: Nod in agreement.

rows.label: qev061001_JNK0020
rows.name: Downplay

rows.label: qev061001_SEL0021
rows.name: Say that you haven't helped the Zaruboggan that much.

rows.label: qev061001_MSG0003
rows.name:
You speak with confidence and sincerity. *fsssh*
No doubt that is why we place trust in you so readily.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev061001_MSG0004
rows.name:
You speak with humility and grace. *fsssh*
No doubt that is why we place trust in you so readily.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev061001_MSG0005
rows.name:
*fsssh* I truly believe you are the only one to whom we
can entrust this task.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev061001_MSG0006
rows.name: Please help us learn the true face of Golbogga! *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev061001_JNK0030
rows.name: Ask about Golbogga

rows.label: qev061001_SEL0031
rows.name: Press Feloran for more information about Golbogga.

rows.label: qev061001_JNK0040
rows.name: Ask about Task

rows.label: qev061001_SEL0041
rows.name: Press Feloran for details about the job.

rows.label: qev061001_MSG0007
rows.name:
Golbogga was a divine being who existed on our
homeworld of Bedun. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev061001_MSG0008
rows.name:
We are taught that he bathed the planet in a sea of
voltant before giving birth to our ancestors. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev061001_MSG0009
rows.name:
I have been conducting research around the clock to
uncover the nature of this holy entity as he existed
before the Day of Regrowth. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev061001_MSG0010
rows.name:
Yet most evidence of Golbogga's civilization was lost.
*fsssh* Dissolved in the sea of voltant.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev061001_MSG0011
rows.name:
However, I have just recently learned that someone here
on Mira bears a piece of Golbogga's legacy! *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev061001_MSG0012
rows.name:
I would like to ask you to go and accept that article
from them. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev061001_MSG0013
rows.name:
*fsssh* I would like you to retrieve a piece of
Golbogga's legacy from a certain Zaruboggan.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev061001_MSG0014
rows.name:
All of that legacy was said to have been lost on the
Day of Regrowth. *fsssh* Lost in the sea of voltant that
swallowed our homeworld.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev061001_MSG0015
rows.name:
I do not expect that they will part with it easily.
*fsssh* But I am confident you will succeed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev061001_MSG0016
rows.name:
What do you say? *fsssh*
Will you accept this task?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev061001_MSG0017
rows.name:
*fsssh* Thank you. The article is currently in the hands
of a Zaruboggan named Toluera.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev061001_MSG0018
rows.name:
He is a heretic. *fsssh* When we fled the Ganglion,
he refused to accompany the rest of us,
preferring instead to live alone in Cauldros.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev061001_MSG0019
rows.name:
I do not know what he will demand in exchange for
the article, but I ask that you secure it by any means
necessary. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev061001_MSG0020
rows.name:
That one record of the lost civilization before ours could
become the key to untold discoveries. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev061001_MSG0021
rows.name:
It could reveal the secrets of my kind's origin and more.
*fsssh* You must help us to know our roots![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev061001_MSG0022
rows.name:
Toluera refused to take asylum in New LA with us,
opting instead to live alone in Cauldros. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev061001_MSG0023
rows.name:
I never heard why, but he may have good reason.
*fsssh* You should approach him with the utmost care.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev061001_MSG0024
rows.name: *fsssh* Did Toluera cede Golbogga's legacy to you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev061001_MSG0025
rows.name: ...I see. *fsssh* He asked for a zirtodiamond in return.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev061001_MSG0026
rows.name:
While we were being held by the Ganglion, I heard it
mentioned that one was stored in Sylvalum's Hilal
Stronghold. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev061001_MSG0027
rows.name:
Though I have doubts that something so rare even on
Bedun could really exist in such a place. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev061001_MSG0028
rows.name: *fsssh* Did Toluera cede Golbogga's legacy to you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev061001_MSG0029
rows.name:
...Ah! Then this disk contains a record of the lost era
of Golbogga? *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev061001_JNK0050
rows.name: Confirm

rows.label: qev061001_SEL0051
rows.name: Nod in confirmation.

rows.label: qev061001_JNK0060
rows.name: Inform

rows.label: qev061001_SEL0061
rows.name: Tell him that Toluera said Golbogga never existed.

rows.label: qev061001_MSG0030
rows.name:
My heart is racing. *fsssh* To think I will finally know
the face of the one who gave us life![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev061001_MSG0031
rows.name: Hmm... That reminds me of someone... *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev061001_MSG0032
rows.name:
Back when we were still on our homeworld of Bedun,
there was a troubled Zaruboggan who claimed that
Golbogga did not exist. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev061001_MSG0033
rows.name:
Yes, I am sure of it now. His name was Toluera.
*fsssh* Such a sad individual.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev061001_MSG0034
rows.name:
...But all of that matters not. *fsssh*
Not now that we have Golbogga's legacy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev061001_MSG0035
rows.name:
*fsssh* I will set about investigating its contents now.
The long-concealed truths regarding Golbogga will
soon be brought to light![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev061001_MSG0036
rows.name: *fsssssssssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev061001_MSG0037
rows.name:
Hrmmm. Troubling. The disk is encrypted. *fsssh*
It seems it can't be viewed in this state.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev061001_MSG0038
rows.name:
I doubt anyone but Kiliran could manage to get past
something this complex. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev061001_MSG0039
rows.name:
I am most truly sorry to heap favor upon favor,
but could I ask you to show this disk to a Zaruboggan
named Kiliran and ask him to unlock it? *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev061001_MSG0040
rows.name:
He travels Mira performing voltant geological surveys,
so I'm afraid he won't be easily found. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev061001_MSG0041
rows.name:
I apologize for the inconvenience, but please. *fsssh*
We're but one final step away from learning the truth
about Golbogga.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev061001_MSG0042
rows.name:
*fsssh* I don't know that I've ever seen protection that
thorough before. It was almost as if Golbogga himself
was hiding his nature from us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev061001_MSG0043
rows.name:
Forgive me. That was terribly unscientific. *fsssh*
Please find Kiliran and have him decrypt the disk.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev061001_MSG0044
rows.name: *fsssh* Did Toluera cede Golbogga's legacy to you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev061001_MSG0045
rows.name:
...What?! You have chosen to side with one who would
deny Golbogga's existence?! *fsssh* *fsssh* *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev061001_MSG0046
rows.name:
But why? *fsssh* What could drive you to endorse such
blasphemy?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev061001_MSG0047
rows.name:
...You would choose Toluera, then? I don't understand
what you could see in such a deviant unbeliever. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev061001_MSG0048
rows.name: *fsssh* I find your thinking utterly inscrutable.[ST:wait ]
